title: First atop infinity
description: Blogging about BQN, APL and array languages, code golfing, and computational/computer science.

items.title: A coding impromptu
items.content_text: A rolling collection of algorithms and computational ideas I like, implemented in BQN.

items.title: BQN's Quantum Noise
items.content_html: Implement a Schrödinger-style quantum computing simulator in BQN, and test it with Shor's algorithm.

items.title: Songs to pave the seasons
items.content_html: Analysis of Spotify user data with BQN.

items.title: Helonium's Hartree-Fock program
items.content_html: Implement the Hartree-Fock program from the Szabo-Ostlund book. From Fortran to BQN.

items.title: Scheming a mise-en-abîme in BQN
items.content_html: Build an interpreter for the Scheme programming language in BQN. Write a lisp quine, using my version of Norvig's lispy.

items.title: Coding in Advent
items.content_html: My Advent of Code solutions for the year 2024, the 25 days in BQN.

items.title: The miniaturist's neural network
items.content_html: Implement a neural network (multilayer perceptron) in BQN, and test it with the logistic map.

items.title: Climbing Mount Euler
items.content_html: Solutions to selected Project Euler problems in BQN.
